areaList.noAreas: There are no areas to display. Please select your favorite areas in settings.
areaList.confirmDeleteMessage: Do you really want to delete the area
areaList.expandTooltip: Expand the area to display sub areas

layerList.noLayers: There are no layers to display. Please select your favorite layers in settings.
layerList.removeLayerTooltip: Remove the layer from the map
layerList.addLayerTooltip: Add the layer to the map
layerList.layerDetailTooltip: Display more information about the layer

layers.title: Layers settings
layers.annotation: Select your favorite layers, which are going to be displayed in the side bar in the Layers' view
layers.starBorderTooltip: Mark all layers as not favorite
layers.singleStarTooltip: This layer is currently marked as favorite, click to remove it from favorites.
layers.singleStarBorderTooltip: This layer is currently not marked as favorite, click to add it to favorites.

areas.title: Areas settings
areas.annotation: Select your favorite area, which are going to be displayed in the side bar in the Areas' view
areas.starBorderTooltip: Mark all areas as not favorite
areas.singleStarTooltip: This area is currently marked as favorite, click to remove it from favorites.
areas.singleStarBorderTooltip: This area is currently not marked as favorite, click to add it to favorites.

selectView.title: Area editor
selectView.subtitle: Please choose the interaction type below and draw the area directly on the map or use the import button.

drawOptions.pointTooltip: Point interaction is the best for creating an area for one specific point or including one point outside of polygon.
drawOptions.lineStringTooltip: Line string interaction is the best when you want to be more precise while defining a new area.
drawOptions.polygonTooltip: Polygon interaction is the most commonly used interaction types for defining new areas.

saveNewAreaPopup.title: Save New Area
saveNewAreaPopup.content: To create a new area, please enter the area name and click Save

errorWindow.errorMessage: Something went wrong! We are very sorry, please try again later or contact your administrator.
